name: Down in the Fifth Round
description:
You're in deep to the mob. To pay off your debt, you must throw your next boxing match and get yourself KO'd in the fifth round. The catch: your opponent is a geriatric turtle.

Made in 72 hours for Wowie Jam #3, following the theme "Failure is Progress".

Created by Jake Ellis

Music by Derek Bertram

Additional art by Kevin Ellis
